Name: Slime Killer
About the game: Slime Killer is a top-down TDS action game where you have to destroy a huge number of slugs with a variety of weapons. From itself the game is an arena shooter, where every minute the number of enemies becomes more and more, and it becomes harder and harder to survive. Also, slugs are becoming more and more dangerous, so having accumulated a certain amount, you can upgrade your weapon to defeat a huge mega-slug. In the game you will find more than eight types of weapons, various types of slugs, ranging from the smallest and fastest, ending with nuclear and explosive.
